resource.name: Remediation Task for {{vars.input.records[0].name}}
resource.description: Get in touch with **{{vars.v_Username}}** and determine whether the Alert is legitimate

routes.name: Set Source Data -> Copy  of Set Variables
is a Beaconing Alert -> Get IP Reputation
routes.label: yes

routes.name: is Malicious -> Copy  of Update Alert
routes.label: no

routes.name: Update Alert Attributes -> is a Beaconing Alert
is a Beaconing Alert -> Create Remediation Task
routes.label: no

routes.name: Create Remediation Task -> Create Incident with Manual Tasks

resource.name: Suspicious Email from: {{vars.email_sender}}
resource.description:
Suspicious Email: {{vars.email_sender}}
From: {{vars.v_Source_Type}}

To: {{vars.email_recipient}}

Email contains a malicious URL: {{vars.body_artifacts.URL.0}}

message.content: Legitimate email, closing the alert as False Positive

resource.name: Suspicious Email from: {{vars.email_sender}}
resource.description:
Suspicious Email: {{vars.email_sender}}
From: {{vars.v_Source_Type}}

To: {{vars.email_recipient}}

The email is safe, Alert closed as false positive

routes.name: Set Source Data -> Copy  of Set Variables
Is Malicious -> Copy  of Update Alert Attributes
routes.label: no

routes.name: Crete Asset -> Malicious Email Update Alert
Malicious Email Update Alert -> Create Email
